title: r/Idontworkherelady They Thought I Worked Here... I Accidentally Murdered Them
description: r/Idontworkherelady Every once in a while, you come across a truly insane story on Reddit that leaves you wondering if it could possibly be true. Today, we've got one of those stories. OP encounters two absolutely disgusting people at a gas station and intentionally sabotages their car. They later end up in a fatal car crash, which means that OP might have inadvertently killed them. If you like this episode, follow my podcast for more daily Reddit content!
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
